# CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundAwayFromZero

**Case**

Rounds away from zero.

## Declaration

```swift
case roundAwayFromZero
```

## Discussion

This method rounds away from zero if the absolute value of the fraction is greater than `0`.

## Rounding Methods

- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundHalfAwayFromZero**: Rounds half away from zero.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundTowardZero**: Rounds toward zero.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.quickTime**: Rounds using the QuickTime method.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundTowardPositiveInfinity**: Rounds toward positive infinity.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundTowardNegativeInfinity**: Rounds toward negative infinity.
title: CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundAwayFromZero
